data_table.description: ECG Rhythm Strip, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ERHAFLAG
variable.description: ERHAFLAG [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA03M
variable.description: Date ECG recorded: months [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA03D
variable.description: Date ECG recorded: days [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA03Y
variable.description: Date ECG recorded: year [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA04M
variable.description: Date ECG sent: months [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA04D
variable.description: Date ECG sent: days[ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA04Y
variable.description: Date ECG sent: years [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA05M
variable.description: Date ECG coded: months [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA05D
variable.description: Date ECG coded: days [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA05Y
variable.description: Date ECG coded: years [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA07
variable.description: Arrhythmia #1. Q7 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA08
variable.description: Arrhythmia #2. Q8 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA09
variable.description: Arrhythmia #3. Q9 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA10
variable.description: Arrhythmia #4. Q10 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA11
variable.description: Arrhythmia #5. Q11 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA12
variable.description: Arrhythmia #5. Q12 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA13
variable.description: SVPB (supraventricular premature beat). Q13 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA14
variable.description: VPB (premature ventricular beat). Q14 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA15
variable.description: RNBG. Q15 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA16
variable.description: MF. Q16 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA17
variable.description: TR. Q17 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA18
variable.description: QT duration (Millisec). Q18 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA19
variable.description: Coupling interval (Millisec). Q19 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA20
variable.description: R-R (M.M.). Q20 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA21
variable.description: Heart rate per minute. Q21 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA22
variable.description: Tech problem. Q22 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: ERHA23
variable.description: Clear. Q23 [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [ECG Rhythm Strip, exam 1]
